actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Spear or Tusk attacks and one Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage and the ogre gains 5 (2d4) temp hp.

actions.name: Spear (Ogre Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 10 ft. or range 20/60' one target 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage or 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Tusk (Boar Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Devouring Charge (Boar Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: If it moves at least 20' straight toward a target and then hits it with Tusk attack on the same turn the target must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the ogre can make one Bite attack vs. it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves vs. charmed; Immune: magic sleep.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a language.
